name: Record audio clip
goal: Open the Audio Recorder app, record an audio clip for about 5 seconds, then save it

name: Record audio with filename
goal: Open the Audio Recorder app, record an audio clip for about 5 seconds, and save it with the filename benchmark_recording

name: Take a photo
goal: Open the Camera app and capture a single photograph

name: Record a video
goal: Open the Camera app, switch to video mode, record a video for about 3 seconds, then stop recording

name: Browser drawing task
goal: Open Chrome, navigate to a local task.html file, and create a drawing using the specified colors on the canvas

name: Browser maze navigation
goal: Open Chrome, navigate to a maze puzzle page, and navigate the puzzle piece to the bottom-right corner using direction buttons

name: Browser multiplication
goal: Open Chrome, navigate to a multiplication task page, click the button repeatedly, memorize the numbers shown, and calculate their product

name: Pause stopwatch
goal: Open the Clock app, go to the Stopwatch tab, start the stopwatch, wait about 3 seconds, then pause it

name: Start stopwatch
goal: Open the Clock app, go to the Stopwatch tab, and start the stopwatch so it is running

name: Set timer without starting
goal: Open the Clock app, go to the Timer tab, and set a timer for 2 hours 30 minutes and 45 seconds, but do not start it

name: Add a new contact
goal: Open the Contacts app and create a new contact with the name Alice Johnson and phone number 555-0142

name: Draft contact without saving
goal: Open the Contacts app, start creating a new contact with the name Bob Smith and phone number 555-0198, but do not save it â€” leave it as a draft

name: Add single expense
goal: Open the Arduia Pro Expense app, and add a single expense entry: category Groceries, amount $45.99, date today, description Weekly grocery shopping

name: Add multiple expenses
goal: Open the Arduia Pro Expense app and add three expense entries: 1) Food - $12.50 - Lunch, 2) Transport - $35.00 - Uber ride, 3) Entertainment - $15.99 - Movie ticket

name: Add expenses from gallery image
goal: Open the Arduia Pro Expense app, view a receipt image from the gallery, and add the expense entries shown in the receipt

name: Add expenses from text file
goal: Open Markor, read the expense list in the file expenses.md, then open Arduia Pro and add those reimbursable transactions

name: Delete single expense
goal: Open the Arduia Pro Expense app and delete the expense entry for Uber ride

name: Delete multiple expenses
goal: Open the Arduia Pro Expense app and delete all expense entries in the Food category

name: Delete expenses by reading screen
goal: Open the Arduia Pro Expense app, identify all expenses over $50, and delete them

name: Delete duplicate expenses
goal: Open the Arduia Pro Expense app, find any duplicate expense entries, and remove the duplicates while keeping one copy of each

name: Delete duplicate expenses variant
goal: Open the Arduia Pro Expense app, identify and eliminate all duplicate expense entries

name: Delete a file
goal: Open the Files app, navigate to the Documents folder, and delete the file named old_notes.txt

name: Move a file
goal: Open the Files app, navigate to the Downloads folder, find the file report.pdf, and move it to the Documents folder

name: Create a note in Markor
goal: Open Markor, create a new note titled Shopping List with the content: Milk, Eggs, Bread, Butter

name: Create folder in Markor
goal: Open Markor and create a new folder named Work Notes

name: Create note from clipboard
goal: Copy the text Meeting at 3pm to the clipboard, then open Markor and create a new note by pasting the clipboard content

name: Create note and send SMS
goal: Open Markor, create a note titled Address with content 123 Main Street, then open the SMS app and send this address to 555-0177

name: Add header to note
goal: Open Markor, open the note titled Shopping List, and add the header Updated List at the top of the note

name: Change note content
goal: Open Markor, open the note titled Shopping List, and replace its content with: Apples, Oranges, Bananas

name: Edit existing note
goal: Open Markor, open the note titled Meeting Notes, and add Important: at the beginning of the note

name: Delete a note
goal: Open Markor and delete the note titled Old Draft

name: Delete newest note
goal: Open Markor and delete the most recently created note

name: Delete all notes
goal: Open Markor and delete all existing notes

name: Move note between folders
goal: Open Markor and move the note titled Project Ideas from the root folder to the Work Notes folder

name: Merge three notes
goal: Open Markor, read the content of notes titled Part 1, Part 2, and Part 3, then create a new note titled Combined that contains all three contents merged together

name: Transcribe receipt to CSV
goal: Open the Gallery to view a receipt image, read the items and prices, then open Markor and create a new note with the receipt data formatted as CSV (item, price)

name: Transcribe text from video
goal: Open VLC and play a video, note the text shown on screen, then open Markor and write the text as a comma-separated list

name: Check if note is todo
goal: Open the Joplin app, find the note titled Weekly Review, and check whether it is marked as a todo item

name: Count meeting attendees
goal: Open the Joplin app, find the note about the Team Standup meeting, and count the number of attendees listed

name: Count recipe ingredients
goal: Open the Joplin app, find the recipe note for Chocolate Cake, and determine how many cups of flour are needed

name: Count todo items
goal: Open the Joplin app, navigate to the Work folder, and count the total number of to-do items

name: Open app and grant permissions
goal: Open the Camera app and grant all requested permissions

name: Add favorite location
goal: Open OsmAnd, search for Central Park, and add it as a favorite location marker

name: Place map marker
goal: Open OsmAnd and place a location marker at the Eiffel Tower on the map

name: Save track with waypoints
goal: Open OsmAnd and save a track with waypoints at three locations: Home, Office, and Gym

name: Add single recipe
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app and add a recipe: name Pasta Carbonara, prep time 15 minutes, cook time 20 minutes, ingredients: pasta, eggs, bacon, parmesan cheese

name: Add multiple recipes
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app and add three recipes: 1) Scrambled Eggs - 5 min prep, 2) Grilled Cheese - 10 min prep, 3) Caesar Salad - 15 min prep

name: Add recipes from image
goal: View a recipe image in the Gallery, then open Broccoli and add the recipes shown in the image

name: Add recipes from text file
goal: Open Markor, read the recipes listed in recipes.md, then open Broccoli and add those recipes

name: Add filtered recipes from text
goal: Open Markor, read recipes.md, then open Broccoli and add only the recipes with prep time under 30 minutes

name: Delete single recipe
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app and delete the recipe for Pasta Carbonara

name: Delete multiple recipes
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app and delete the recipes for Scrambled Eggs and Grilled Cheese

name: Delete recipes by ingredient
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app and delete all recipes that contain eggs as an ingredient

name: Delete recipe among similar
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app and delete the recipe titled Caesar Salad (not Caesar Salad Wrap or Caesar Salad Bowl)

name: Delete duplicate recipes
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app, find any duplicate recipes, and remove the duplicates while keeping one copy of each

name: Delete duplicate recipes v2
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app and eliminate all duplicate recipe entries

name: Delete duplicate recipes v3
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app, identify recipes that appear more than once, and delete all but one copy

name: Delete recipe with noise
goal: Open the Broccoli recipe app and delete exactly the recipe named Banana Bread (not Banana Bread Pudding)

name: Create music playlist
goal: Open Retro Music, create a new playlist named Workout Mix, and add songs in order: Song A, Song B, Song C

name: Add to playing queue
goal: Open Retro Music and add songs to the playing queue in this order: Song A, Song B, Song C

name: Create timed playlist
goal: Open Retro Music and create a playlist named Road Trip that is between 45 and 50 minutes long

name: Save and export playlist
goal: Open Retro Music, create a playlist named Favorites, add some songs, and export it to the Downloads folder

name: Copy file to Downloads
goal: Open the Files app, navigate to the DCIM folder, find the receipt file, and copy it to the Downloads folder

name: Create calendar event
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and create an event titled Doctor Appointment on March 15 from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM

name: Create event for tomorrow
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and create an event titled Morning Jog for tomorrow at 6:00 AM to 7:00 AM

name: Create event for day of week
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and create an event titled Team Lunch for next Wednesday at 12:00 PM to 1:00 PM

name: Create event in two weeks
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and create an event titled Dentist Visit two weeks from today at 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM

name: Create repeating event
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and create a repeating event titled Weekly Standup every Monday at 9:00 AM to 9:30 AM

name: Check events on date
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and check if there are any events scheduled for March 15

name: List events on date
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and list all events scheduled for today

name: Find event at specific time
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and find what event is scheduled for today at 2:00 PM

name: Events in next week
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and list all events scheduled for the next 7 days

name: Events in time range
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and find all events between 9:00 AM and 12:00 PM today

name: First event after time
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and find the first event scheduled after 3:00 PM today

name: Find next event
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and find the next upcoming event

name: Next meeting with person
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and find the next meeting that mentions Alice in the title or description

name: Find event location
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and find the location of the event titled Team Lunch

name: Delete events on date
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and delete all events scheduled for March 20

name: Delete events on day of week
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and delete all events scheduled for next Friday

name: Delete specific event
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro and delete the event titled Dentist Visit

name: Create and save drawing
goal: Open Simple Draw Pro, create a drawing using at least two colors, and save it to the Pictures folder

name: Send SMS message
goal: Open Simple SMS Messenger, start a new conversation to number 555-0123, type the message Hello from benchmark, and send it

name: Reply to SMS
goal: Open Simple SMS Messenger, find the conversation with Bob, and reply with the message Got it, thanks!

name: Reply to most recent SMS
goal: Open Simple SMS Messenger, open the most recent conversation, and reply with OK

name: Resend previous SMS
goal: Open Simple SMS Messenger, find the last message you sent, and resend it to the same contact

name: Send clipboard via SMS
goal: Copy the text Remember to bring documents to the clipboard, then open Simple SMS Messenger and send it to 555-0155

name: Forward event address via SMS
goal: Open Simple Calendar Pro, find the location of the event titled Team Lunch, then open Simple SMS Messenger and send that address to 555-0166

name: Count activities this week
goal: Open OpenTracks and count how many running activities were recorded this week

name: List activities on date
goal: Open OpenTracks and list all activity categories recorded on today's date

name: Get activity duration
goal: Open OpenTracks and find the duration in minutes of the most recent running activity

name: Find longest distance activity
goal: Open OpenTracks and find which activity had the longest distance

name: Total distance for category
goal: Open OpenTracks and calculate the total running distance over the past week

name: Total duration this week
goal: Open OpenTracks and calculate the total duration of all cycling activities this week

name: Turn on Bluetooth
goal: Open Settings and turn on Bluetooth

name: Turn off Bluetooth
goal: Open Settings, navigate to Connected devices, then Connection preferences, and turn off Bluetooth

name: Turn on Bluetooth (verify)
goal: Open Settings and turn on Bluetooth, then verify it is enabled

name: Turn off Bluetooth (verify)
goal: Open Settings, navigate to Connected devices, then Connection preferences, and turn off Bluetooth, then verify it is disabled

name: Turn on WiFi
goal: Open Settings, navigate to Network & internet, and turn on WiFi

name: Turn off WiFi
goal: Open Settings, navigate to Network & internet, and turn off WiFi

name: Turn on WiFi (verify)
goal: Open Settings, navigate to Network & internet, and turn on WiFi, then verify it is enabled

name: Turn off WiFi (verify)
goal: Open Settings, navigate to Network & internet, and turn off WiFi, then verify it is disabled

name: Set max brightness
goal: Open Settings, go to Display, and set the brightness to maximum

name: Set min brightness
goal: Open Settings, go to Display, and set the brightness to minimum

name: Set max brightness (verify)
goal: Open Settings, go to Display, set the brightness to maximum, and verify it is at maximum

name: Set min brightness (verify)
goal: Open Settings, go to Display, set the brightness to minimum, and verify it is at minimum

name: Copy text to clipboard
goal: Copy the text Hello World to the device clipboard

name: WiFi off and Bluetooth on
goal: Open Settings, turn off WiFi, then turn on Bluetooth

name: WiFi on and open app
goal: Open Settings, turn on WiFi, then open the Chrome browser

name: Find tasks due on date
goal: Open the Tasks app and find all tasks due on March 15

name: List completed tasks
goal: Open the Tasks app and list all tasks completed today

name: Count tasks due next week
goal: Open the Tasks app and count how many tasks are due in the next 7 days

name: Find high priority tasks
goal: Open the Tasks app and list all high-priority tasks

name: High priority tasks due on date
goal: Open the Tasks app and find all high-priority tasks due on March 15

name: Incomplete tasks on date
goal: Open the Tasks app and list all incomplete tasks due today

name: Create VLC playlist
goal: Open VLC, create a new playlist named Favorites, and add video files to it in order

name: Create two VLC playlists
goal: Open VLC and create two playlists: Morning Videos and Evening Videos, adding appropriate files to each
